item.title: Scaffolding in Development
item.description: So I preferably enjoy working with low level APIs instead of high level APIs. The main reason behind that is the amount of control I have as a developer, especially on creating the functionality I need. So if there is an alternative API which provides a lower level solution than a high level API which does exactly what I need… I would still go for the lower level solution, even if I have to recreate the same functionality as the high level API.
